regcore.migrations.0003_index_charset module¶

class regcore.migrations.0003_index_charset.Migration[source]¶

Bases: south.v2.SchemaMigration

The purpose of this migration is to enforce the correct character set and collation in mysql databases. We need utf8 to encode certain, non-latin characters and we need a case-sensitive collation so that we might have both 1005-A-b and 1005-A-B.

forwards(orm)[source]¶
